text: Heterometrus gravimanus is a species of scorpion belonging to the family Scorpionidae. It is found in India and Sri Lanka.http://www.science.marshall.edu/fet/euscorpius/p2004_15.pdf ==References== ==External links== * Animal World Category:Scorpionidae Category:Endemic fauna of India Category:Endemic fauna of Sri Lanka Category:Animals described in 1894
title: Heterometrus gravimanus
